QuestData.Title: Fruit of the Gods
QuestData.Description:
You like sweet fruit?
Stewards grow juiciest Purian. It special fruit! You find it many places in Bastion. It used for many things.
Eat for nourishment.
Give to bells for blessings.
Give to stewards for treasure.
You find, I show you how!
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, this very sweet and ripe. Must use quickly, before it spoils!
